articles.title: PRECIOUS-Gold holds tight range as focus turns to U.S. jobs data
articles.description: Gold prices held in a tight range on Friday as investors stayed away from making big bets ahead of the U.S. nonfarm payrolls data that could sway Federal Reserve's monetary policy stance.
articles.content:
July 2 (Reuters) - Gold prices held in a tight range on Friday as investors stayed away from making big bets ahead of the U.S. nonfarm payrolls data that could sway Federal Reserve’s monetary policy stance.
FUNDAMENTALS
* Spot gold was steady at $1,7... [1665 chars]

articles.title: PREVIEW-Olympics-Weightlifting-Lifters under pressure as doping puts Games future at risk
articles.description: Weightlifting has been part of the programme of the Olympics since the very first event in Athens in 1896, but it is facing the risk of removal from the Games over persistent doping. Scores of doping cases have been uncovered in the sport in recent years, including Kazakhstan's Rio 2016 gold medalist Nijat Rahimov, who was charged with offences by the International Testing Agency (ITA) last year.
articles.content:
Weightlifting has been part of the programme of the Olympics since the very first event in Athens in 1896, but it is facing the risk of removal from the Games over persistent doping.

articles.title: Gold Rate In Pakistan
articles.description: Gold Rate In Pakistan on 2 July 2021 are being sold for Rs.92770 per 10 grams, and the price of Gold is Rs.108200 per tola in Pakistan.
articles.content:
Gold Rate in Pakistan today on 2 July 2021 is being sold for Rs. 92770 per 10 grams, and the price of Gold is Rs. 108200 per tola in Pakistan today.

articles.title: In third such incident in 4 days: Employee of jewellery shop disappears with 125.960gm gold in Chandigarh
articles.description: The total worth of the stolen 125.960 gm gold is more than Rs 5 lakh. The suspected employee, identified as Sujay Maity, was living in a rented accommodation in Sector 25.
articles.content:
The incident comes four days after an employee at Anup Goldsmith in Sector 23 stole 1.50 kg gold, diamond ornaments, and cash worth Rs 3 from the shop.
A manager at Talwarson’s Jewellers in Sector 22 Thursday reported that one of their employees has ... [1046 chars]

articles.title: Gold loans rising: should you pledge your holdings, or sell some of them?
articles.description: While many people are looking to monetise their gold holdings to meet their immediate needs, the question is: When should you consider taking a gold loan?
articles.content:
A rising cash crunch and unforeseen medical expenses seem to have prompted people to go for gold loans. (Bloomberg/ Representational)
Over the last 15 months, the pandemic has dented household earnings, especially in the middle and lower income categ... [5149 chars]

articles.title: Tecatito Corona nos convocados do México para a Gold Cup
articles.description: Extremo do FC Porto nos eleitos de Tata Martino.
articles.content:
O México divulgou, esta quinta-feira, os convocados para a participação na Gold Cup, e entre os eleitos de Tata Martino está o portista Jesús Corona.

articles.title: Toronto FC coach Chris Armas awaits word on when his players will leave for Gold Cup
articles.description: Toronto FC coach Chris Armas says talks continue about when exactly his team's Gold Cup contingent leaves for the CONCACAF championship. The main portion of the tournament runs July 10 to Aug. 1.
